Paragraph: A second percutaneous mechanical thrombectomy was performed six days later and resulted in partial revascularization of the SVC and central veins .

In this paragraph, the "Disease" entities refer to the medical conditions related to the blood vessels. The term "partial revascularization of the SVC and central veins" indicates a medical procedure that is being performed to address a blockage or obstruction in the SVC (superior vena cava) and central veins, which can be considered as a disease condition.
